text: Time to keep up with the holiday chargers! As Kourtney Kardashian and Younes Bendjima continue their summer vacation, the couple received a few extra guests when the Kardashians star's children arrived late that week. News has learned that the businesswoman's children have joined the couple as they continue their stay in Positano on the Amalfi Coast. ` ` They did some boat rides in Positano to see the sights and the kids enjoyed the city for ice cream.'' A source shared with us. ` ` They have an amazing and relaxed journey together.''
